text: Pré-en-Pail is a former commune of 2 128 people (2004). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Pré-en-Pail-Saint- Samson.Arrêté préfectoral 4 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Mayenne
title: Pré-en-Pail
